messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] My son is typing words
messages.msgSnippet: My youngest typed kissing poop and then changed it to ... asks how to ... his ... Awww...Grandma would be so proud!!!  Tee hee!!
messages.messageBody:
My youngest typed "kissing poop" and then changed it to
> "pissing poop". He thought that was quite funny. Actually any bodily
> function they consider funny. This is the first time though. Usually he
asks how to

his
> own. YEA!!

> Pam G



Awww...Grandma would be so proud!!! Tee hee!!

messages.subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] My son is typing words
messages.msgSnippet: Well, my son Phillip (6 yo) today typed his first words by himself on the computer.  He is not reading yet but the boys were playing some type of multiplayer
messages.messageBody:
Well, my son Phillip (6 yo) today typed his first words by himself on the
computer. He is not reading yet but the boys were playing some type of
multiplayer game. Each was on his own computer and they were connected into this game.
Anyway there is a feature where you can send messages to the other person on
the other computer. My youngest typed "kissing poop" and then changed it to
"pissing poop". He thought that was quite funny. Actually any bodily
function they consider funny. This is the first time though. Usually he asks how to
spell words and he types them in as I spell them, this one he did all on his
own. YEA!!

Pam G


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
